name: Amount from the object
instruction:
Create a function `sumFromObject` that takes an object with two properties `a` and `b`.

An example of an object that will be passed to the function:
```javascript
{
  a: 10,
  b: 20
}
```

The function should return the sum of the properties `a` and `b` of the object.

An example of running the function:
```javascript
sumFromObject({a: 10, b: 20}) // 30
```


A similar example:
```javascript
function multi(obj) {
  return obj.a * obj.b;
}
```
